title: Ball Of Questions Pro Wear
summary: Reborn of the classic magic 8 ball
description: This app works like a real Magic 8 Ball. Simply ask a question (Yes or No questions) and shake the device and the answer shall be revealed. Instead of shaking you can see the answer with touching the ball as well. App works on your smartwatch too (ANDROID WEAR support)!If you want you can try the free version with ads and no smartwatch support: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ball.of.questions
descriptionHTML:
This app works like a real Magic 8 Ball. Simply ask a question (Yes or No questions) and shake the device and the answer shall be revealed. Instead of shaking you can see the answer with touching the ball as well. App works on your smartwatch too (ANDROID WEAR support)!
If you want you can try the free version with ads and no smartwatch support: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ball.of.questions
comments: Not much, there should definitely be more added to the app.
The only thing i can think of at the moment is a feature where you can use your own answers.  To add/edit/remove.   I wish we could do this
